00008 #include "ibase/TLoggerCompWrap.h"

00011 namespace ibase
00012 {
00013 
00014 
00018 template <class ObserverComponent>
00019 class TModelObserverCompWrap: public ObserverComponent
00020 {
00021 public:
00022        typedef ObserverComponent BaseClass;
00023 
00024        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TModelObserverCompWrap);
00025               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(imod::IObserver);
00026               I_ASSIGN(m_defaultModelCompPtr, "DefaultModel", "Data model to be connected to the observer", false, "DefaultModel");
00027               I_TASSIGN_TO(m_defaultObjectCompPtr, m_defaultModelCompPtr, false);
00028        I_END_COMPONENT;
00029 
00030 protected:
00031        // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00032        virtual void OnComponentCreated();
00033        virtual void OnComponentDestroyed();
00034 
00035 private:
00036        I_REF(imod::IModel, m_defaultModelCompPtr);
00037        I_TREF(typename ObserverComponent::ModelType, m_defaultObjectCompPtr);
00038 };
00039 
00040 
00041 // protected methods
00042 
00043 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00044 
00045 template <class ObserverComponent>
00046 void TModelObserverCompWrap<ObserverComponent>::OnComponentCreated()
00047 {
00048        BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
00049 
00050        I_IF_DEBUG(
00051               if (m_defaultModelCompPtr.IsValid() && !m_defaultObjectCompPtr.IsValid()){
00052                      const icomp::IComponentContext* contextPtr = BaseClass::GetComponentContext();
00053                      QByteArray observerComponentId;
00054                      if (contextPtr != NULL){
00055                             observerComponentId = contextPtr->GetContextId();
00056                      }
00057 
00058                      QByteArray modelComponentId;
00059 
00060                      icomp::IComponent* modelComponentPtr = dynamic_cast<icomp::IComponent*>(m_defaultModelCompPtr.GetPtr());
00061                      I_ASSERT(modelComponentPtr != NULL);
00062                      const icomp::IComponentContext* modelContextPtr = modelComponentPtr->GetComponentContext();
00063                      if (modelContextPtr != NULL){
00064                             modelComponentId = modelContextPtr->GetContextId();
00065                      }
00066 
00067                      QString exptectedObjectInterface = typeid(ObserverComponent::ModelType).name();
00068 
00069                      QString debugMessage = QString("Try to bind the Observer <%1> to Model <%2>. Data model interface is not supported by this observer. Expected interface is: %3")
00070                             .arg(QString(observerComponentId))
00071                             .arg(QString(modelComponentId))
00072                             .arg(exptectedObjectInterface);
00073 
00074                      qDebug(debugMessage.toUtf8());
00075               }
00076        )
00077 
00078        if (m_defaultModelCompPtr.IsValid() && m_defaultObjectCompPtr.IsValid()){
00079               m_defaultModelCompPtr->AttachObserver(this);
00080        }
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 template <class ObserverComponent>
00085 void TModelObserverCompWrap<ObserverComponent>::OnComponentDestroyed()
00086 {
00087        if (m_defaultModelCompPtr.IsValid() && m_defaultModelCompPtr->IsAttached(this)){
00088               m_defaultModelCompPtr->DetachObserver(this);
00089        }
00090 
00091        BaseClass::OnComponentDestroyed();
00092 }
00093

00095 } // namespace ibase
